text: Walter Olkewicz (November 14, 1948 â€“ April 6, 2021) was an American character actor. He played Marko in the TV series Wizards and Warriors. He also played Coach Wordman in the 1984 movie Making the Grade. Olkewicz died after a long illness on April 6, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Bayonne, New Jersey
